name: Asteroids on Steroids (Ondrejoda)
description:
Asteroids on Steroids is an Asteroids clone which I managed to complete in less then 72 hours. Compared to the original game, the game includes multiple new features, such as: 

 Classes

Magazines and reloading

Screen zooming

A life counter as a trail behind the player (more on that later)

More aesthetic visuals

...and more!

It is also much more physics-based then the original game, for example, the bullets that you shoot can bounce off an asteroid and hit another asteroid again.

CONTROLS 

 W, A, S, D - movement of the ship

Mouse Movement - aiming the ship

MOUSE1 - firing the weapon

R - reloading

Scroll Wheel - zooming in or out the view of the player from 1x to 3x

Esc - exit the level to the main menu

CREDITS 

 All art assets were custom made. The font is the Roboto font, credit where it is due.

The menu music is Prism Age - Plural and the in-game music is HOME - High Five, both of which are modofied to fit the game better.

FINAL NOTE 

 The HTML5 port of this game is playable, but it is NOT recommended due to it's bad performance. Downloading the PC version is recommended.
